Abdullah_al-Mahdi_Billah_children.name: Al-Qa'im bi-Amr Allah
Abdullah_al-Mahdi_Billah_children.notes: Also known as Muhammad al-Qa'im bi-Amr Allah. He was the second Fatimid Caliph and twelfth Isma'ili Imam.

Abdullah_al-Mahdi_Billah_children.name: Abu'l-Qasim al-Tayyib
Abdullah_al-Mahdi_Billah_children.notes: Little is known about his life.
